## Page 1

Natural Mediterranean Beauty

## Page 2

Be Mediterranean
Color Clay® is born on the Mediterranean shore
in Barcelona's area; an environment surrounded
by nature, brightness and freshness.
Our clays feature a wide range of extraordinary
natural colours and a great richness in minerals
which are beneficial for the skin.
The Mediterranean lifestyle is characterized by
its taste for wellbeing, healthy habits and its
historical beauty and body worship.
Color Clay® brings together all these attributes in
the form of clay to provide personal care with a
piece of this unique and exclusive land.
Be Natural
Here, in the warmth of our land, clays have been
identified, analysed and their purity has been
discovered.
Color Clay® product range is 100% natural, no
additives or chemicals have been added in its
manufacturing process.
Approaching traditional methods has allowed
the clay to keep its region authenticity and
guaranteeing the essence of our well-being.
Color Clay® is the Mediterranean purest treasure
unearthed for the cosmetic industry ..

## Page 4

Properties
Color Clay® range of products have different
composition and morphology depending on their
source. Nevertheless, they all have some common
characteristics that provide outstanding properties to
finished formulations:
Colour range
Its different composition provides a full range of natural
stable colouring agents for formulating. It gives a
special attraction that evokes its origins in the warm
coasts of the Mediterranean.
Natural ingredient
Completely natural without additives, Color Clay®
brings earth essentials close to personal care industry.
A gift from ancient nature worth to apply into cosmetic
products.
Absorption capacity
Laminar silicate is the main crystal structure. Color
Clay® is mechanically processed and finely grinded
below 44 microns. Its high specific surface makes it an
agent with excellent absorptive capabilities.
Improved skin feel
Its laminar platelet structure and very small particle size
gives an excellent spreadability. This contributes to the
formula providing smooth and pleasant texture.
Mechanical cleanser
Combines perfectly with the cleansing effect of
surfactants, complementing it with mild mechanical
effect provided by the soft particle of the clay. Clean
skin, impurities free.
Dead cell renewal
The small particle size of the clay enables to formulate
products with a mild exfoliating effect that drags the
dead cells when rinsed off, helping the cell renewal of
the skin.
,
Rich in minerals
Extraordinary rich in minerals, similar to the skin and
cell constituents.

## Page 5

Uses
Color Clay® is one of the most versatile cosmetic
ingredient available. It can directly be mixed with water
or other cosmetic ingredients to obtain a paste for facial
masks, body SPA treatments; or can be easily formulated
into several cosmetic products as creamy masks, soaps,
emulsions and shampoos.
Natural facial and body wraps
Mixed with water, oils and actives, Color Clay®
produces an homogenous paste that is easily
spreadable as a wrap for wellness treatments. Pure
nature for natural therapies.
Physical cleanser in mild
surfactant systems
It complements the washing action in make up
removers, micellar waters, cleansing milks and
shampoos with a mild physical cleansing effect.
Colouring range for soaps
It offers natural colours to soap bars and liquid soap
formulations, stable at any pH. Nine different colours
awaken the formulator creativity.
Mild natural exfoliator for
creams and serums
Its small particle size below 44 microns allows a gentle
exfoliating effect. Used in creams and serums it is an
extraordinary soft dead cell renewal.
Oil absorber in facial masks
Its high silicate content combined with its high specific
surface, provides the clay with a high oil adsorption
capacity. Clay brings refreshing effect to the skin after
soaking up the excess of sebum.
Natural colouring agent for
colour cosmetics and make up
Used in colour cosmetics Color Clay® gives shade or
base colour providing naturalness and originality to
make up. Not being a pigment, it does not have a Cl.
Due to its natural origin colour, shade may slightly
change from batch to batch.

## Page 6

Be Sustainable
Colorclay S.L. is fully involved within the environment though the reforestation
and establishment of livestock areas in the quarries.
This recovery involves returning to productive land by allowing the recuperation
of the mineral properties and implementing forests, preserving the environment
and contributing to the oxygen generation. Sustainability is our concern.
We return to the earth what it has been given to us.

gpt_manufacturer_or_supplier_reason: Page 6 mentions 'Colorclay S.L.' in the context of sustainability and environmental involvement related to Color Clay®. Additionally, the product range is distributed worldwide by DKSH Marketing Services Spain, S.A.U., but the manufacturer or supplier name directly associated with Color Clay® is Colorclay S.L.
gpt_select_industry_cluster_reason: Selected Personal Care because the document explicitly mentions uses in facial and body wraps, mild surfactant cleansing systems, soaps, creams, serums, facial masks, and color cosmetics, all of which are personal care applications. There is no mention of use in homecare or institutional cleaning products.
gpt_select_compositions_reason: Selected Mineral because the document clearly states that Color Clay® is a natural clay product rich in minerals, with laminar silicate as the main crystal structure and mineral content similar to skin and cell constituents. No mention of biomolecules, micro-organisms, synthetic substances, derived natural extracts, or vegetal sources is made.
gpt_select_functions_reason: Selected Cleanser because the document mentions Color Clay works synergistically with surfactants to provide mild mechanical cleansing. Selected Exfoliant because it states the small particle size enables mild exfoliation and dead cell renewal. Selected Skin Sensory Additive due to improved skin feel from laminar platelet structure and small particle size providing smooth texture. Selected Texturizer because the product offers excellent spreadability and smooth texture. Selected Visual Carrier because the product provides a natural coloring range for cosmetics and soaps, acting as a natural colorant.
gpt_select_applications_reason: Selected Color Care because the document mentions Color Clay® as a natural colouring agent for colour cosmetics and make up. Selected Hair Care because it is used as a physical cleanser in mild surfactant systems including shampoos. Selected Skin Care because of its properties for mild exfoliation, dead cell renewal, oil absorption in facial masks, and mineral richness beneficial for skin. Selected Soap & Bath because it is suitable for soap bars and liquid soap formulations as a natural coloring range. Selected Spa & Wellness because the product is used in natural facial and body wraps for wellness treatments and natural therapies, as shown in the images and described in the uses.
gpt_cas_from_doc_reason: The document provides detailed information about Color Clay by Colorclay S.L., including product description, properties, uses, and sustainability commitment, but does not mention any CAS Registry Number.
gpt_physical_form_reason: Selected Powder because the document mentions the product as finely ground clay below 44 microns and shows images of clay powders in glass vials, indicating the physical form is powder.
gpt_gen_product_description: Color Clay® by Colorclay S.L. is a natural Mediterranean clay sourced near Barcelona, Spain, available in a variety of rich, stable colors. Finely ground below 44 microns, it offers excellent absorption, gentle exfoliation, and smooth texture. Ideal for facial and body wraps, mild cleansers, natural exfoliators, and cosmetic colorants, it supports skin renewal and oil absorption without additives or chemicals.
gpt_recommended_dosage_reason: No recommended dosage instructions, including dosage amount, units, frequency, or administration route, are mentioned in the document for Color Clay by Colorclay S.L.
gpt_certifications_reason: No explicit mention of any certifications related to Color Clay by Colorclay S.L. is found in the document. The text emphasizes natural origin, purity, and sustainability but does not state any formal certification from the listed options.
gpt_claims_reason: Selected Natural Cosmetic because the product is described as 100% natural with no additives or chemicals. Selected Purifying because it acts as a mechanical cleanser removing impurities gently. Selected Sebum Control because it absorbs excess sebum in facial masks. Selected Skin Renewal because it provides mild exfoliation aiding dead cell renewal. Selected Smoothing because the small particle size and laminar platelet structure provide excellent spreadability and smooth texture.
gpt_health_benefits_reason: Only applicable for FBI business line
